import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from './shopContext' import remove_icon from '../assests/cart_cross_icon.png' import './cartitems.css' const Cartitems = () => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart}=useContext(ShopContext) return (

Products

Title

s

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0) { return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*Cartitems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}}alt=""/>
} })}
) } export default Cartitems
